name: Life of Chuckles
description:
Live the life of "Chuckles", as he strives to solve the every time more complex realities of his days.

Make sure the input is active by clicking on the game area

Instructions

  • Move using the left and right arrow keys, change balls direction with up and down.
  • Don't let balls fall
  • Make choices by making chuckles standing to the left or right of screen.
